attributes.action: The UK must not get "locked in" to whatever Brexit MPs now choose.
attributes.background: If parliament is going to ignore the public after asking us what they should do, they must ensure we are not trapped in whatever Brexit they now choose. No PM can tie the hands of a future PM - it is more vital than ever that this is adhered to going forwards.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to ensure it doesn't get "locked in" to whatever Brexit decisions are taken now.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you want taken.
